title: 【求助】1.6.1游戏开启时出错
author: syobon
txt_content:
用的是MagicLauncher_1.1.6  电脑是 Mac OS X 10.8.4的MacBook Air 用MinecraftSP启动器玩1.5.2时正常但用MagicLauncher_1.1.6玩1.6.1时开始后弹框并出现以下文字且Minecraft没有开启。（用的是此贴的整合 http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... 2&highlight=1.6）（Ps:我是盗版）

*** MagicMinecraftLauncher 1.1.6 ***
  LCP: ;/Users/Szeto/Downloads/Library/Application Support/Minecraft/versions/1.6.1/1.6.1.jar;bin/jinput.jar;bin/lwjgl.jar;bin/lwjgl_util.jar
  ShowLog: true
  WindowMaximized: true
  InactiveExtMods: 1.6.1 DamageIndicators v2.8.2.0 .zip;[1.6.1]ReiMinimap_v3.4.zip
  MainClass: net.minecraft.client.Minecraft
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.minecraft.client.Minecraft
    at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
    at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
    at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
    at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:247)
    at magic.launcher.Launcher.main(Unknown Source)
